products.name: Classic Provençal Wallet
products.description: Handcrafted leather wallet inspired by the timeless elegance of Provence. Made from premium full-grain leather, this wallet develops a beautiful patina over time. Each piece is carefully stitched by hand using traditional techniques passed down through generations.

products.name: Artisan Tote Bag
products.description: Spacious tote bag crafted with love in the heart of Provence. Perfect for market days or city adventures, this bag combines functionality with rustic elegance. The natural leather will age beautifully, telling your unique story.

products.name: Hand-Stitched Leather Belt
products.description: A testament to traditional craftsmanship, this belt is entirely hand-stitched using the saddle stitch technique. Inspired by the leather goods of Provençal artisans, it's designed to last a lifetime and improve with age.

products.name: Lavender Keychain
products.description: Small but mighty, this keychain carries the essence of Provence. Crafted from premium leather scraps to minimize waste, each piece is unique. A perfect introduction to our craftsmanship or a thoughtful gift.

discounts.name: Christmas Special
discounts.description: Celebrate the holidays with 20% off our Classic Provençal Wallet

discounts.name: New Year Collection
discounts.description: Start the year with 15% off all bags
